fields.description: (0 = Not at all likely, 10 = Extremely likely)
fields.label: On a scale of 0 to 10, how likely are you to recommend Prakash Steel Products to a colleague, another business , or a partner ?
What is the primary reason for the score you gave ?

fields.description:
• Product Quality & Consistency (Hot Rolled / Bright Bars)

    • Ease of Placing Orders
    • Clarity and Timeliness of Invoicing & Accounts
    • Marketing & Sales Support provided
